name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.setTransform
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.setTransform() method of the Canvas 2D API resets (overrides) the current transformation to the identity matrix, and then invokes a transformation described by the arguments of this method. This lets you scale, rotate, translate (move), and skew the context.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.setTransform' in HTML Living Standard.
